data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Robert Jones signals a West Ham throw-in in Fulham's half.
In the minute 3, Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
In the minute 6, West Ham have been awarded a corner by Robert Jones.
West Ham pushes forward through Jarrod Bowen, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
In the minute 8, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Fulham are in shooting range from this free kick.
In London Fulham attack through Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 11, Robert Jones awards West Ham a goal kick.
Goal kick for Fulham at London Stadium.
West Ham have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Fulham are pushing forward but Aleksandar Mitrovic's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for West Ham at London Stadium.
Throw-in for Fulham in the half of West Ham.
In the minute 18, Fulham have been awarded a corner by Robert Jones.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
West Ham's Jarrod Bowen breaks free at London Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Robert Jones awards Fulham a goal kick.
In the minute 23, West Ham's Arthur Masuaku gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Fulham's Aleksandar Mitrovic breaks free at London Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 24, West Ham have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Fulham in London.
In the minute 27, Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
West Ham are whistled for offside.
In the minute 30, West Ham have been awarded a corner by Robert Jones.
Throw-in for West Ham close to the penalty box.
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Fulham.
In the minute 32, Fulham needs to be cautious. West Ham have an attacking throw-in.
Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
Fulham have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Can West Ham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fulham's half?
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Robert Jones.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In the minute 40, Aleksandar Mitrovic of Fulham is pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
Robert Jones has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Robert Jones signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
Robert Jones signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 50, West Ham are coming forward and Aaron Cresswell gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Robert Jones.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Robert Jones.
In the minute 52, West Ham have a dangerous throw-in.
Fulham to take a throw-in in West Ham territory.
Aleksandar Mitrovic is booked for the away team.
In the minute 56, West Ham's Angelo Ogbonna has been booked in London.
Robert Jones signals a free kick to Fulham.
Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Fulham in the half of West Ham.
Throw-in for Fulham at London Stadium.
Fulham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, Free kick Fulham.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
In London West Ham attack through Pablo Fornals. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Robert Jones signals a West Ham throw-in in Fulham's half.
Angelo Ogbonna is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 63, Angelo Ogbonna (West Ham) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Issa Diop.
West Ham advance rapidly upfield but Robert Jones blows for offside.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Robert Jones signals a throw-in for Fulham, close to West Ham's area.
Free kick Fulham.
Robert Jones signals a West Ham throw-in in Fulham's half.
Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Fulham.
In the minute 72, Said Benrahma is replacing Pablo Fornals for West Ham at London Stadium.
Manuel Lanzini is replacing Jarrod Bowen for the home team.
In the minute 73, Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
Robert Jones awards Fulham a goal kick.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
The away team have replaced Bobby Reid with Ruben Loftus-Cheek. This is the first substitution made today by Scott Parker.
West Ham push upfield but Robert Jones quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Fulham.
In the minute 83, Fulham are caught offside.
Goal kick for Fulham at London Stadium.
Throw-in Fulham.
In the minute 85, Robert Jones awards the away team a throw-in.
Robert Jones signals a free kick to West Ham.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
In the minute 88, Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
Robert Jones signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
At London Stadium, Ruben Loftus-Cheek has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 89, West Ham have a dangerous throw-in.
West Ham have been awarded a corner by Robert Jones.
At London Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
An attacking Fulham player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
A massive blow for Fulham as Ademola Lookman misses from the spot.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Tomas Soucek scores to make it 1-0 at London Stadium.
Great play from Said Benrahma to set up the goal.
Issa Diop (West Ham) has received a yellow card from Robert Jones.
